snippet: Steve Kerr is one of the busiest men in basketball this time of year, analyzing N.C.A.A. and N.B.A. games for the TNT cable network.
abstract: Excerpts from 30 Seconds Q&A with former NBA player and executive Steve Kerr, who is one of the busiest men in basketball this time of year as an analyst of NCAA and NBA games for the TNT cable network.
lead_paragraph: Steve Kerr is one of the busiest men in basketball this time of year, analyzing N.C.A.A. and N.B.A. games for the TNT cable network.

headline.print_headline: 30 Seconds With Steve Kerr: Watching the Bouncing Balls, College and Pro
headline.seo: Steve Kerr Watches the Bouncing Balls, College and Pro
headline.main: Watching the Bouncing Balls, College and Pro
